Articles.Content:
Wow... this thread is back!

Good thing I still had my spreadsheet. I have updated the stats on the original post.

may i know the meaning of NT

Means iNtuition as a perceiving function, combined with Thinking as a judging function. Lots of good material to read on the many links I have included in my posts if you want to get a better understanding.

INTP

You have moderate preference of Introversion over Extraversion (33%)

You have moderate preference of Intuition over Sensing (50%)

You have moderate preference of Thinking over Feeling (50%)

You have moderate preference of Perceiving over Judging (33%)

I(89%)n(75%)t(88%)j(1%)

Table shaping up nicely, more samples needed.

Edited September 2, 2014 by steve_v

Extravert(1%) iNtuitive(38%) Feeling(12%) Judging(44%)

Nice thread bsalis +rep

I updated the table again.

Close to 50 people now!
Here's some nice blog entry about struggles of having an outgoing personality but actually being introverted.

Just redid the test.

INTJ

EDIT: wow it hasn't changed at all!

Introvert(44%) iNtuitive(75%) Thinking(88%) Perceiving(33%)

Fun stuff

Introvert(67%) iNtuitive(12%) Thinking(88%) Judging(22%)

Did i win?

Introvert(22%) iNtuitive(50%) Thinking(38%) Judging(11%)

Funny, I don't think of myself as introverted at all.

INTP

Introvert(78%) iNtuitive(25%) Thinking(62%) Perceiving(33%)

ENTP, but I have little emotional capacity (psychopath, want evidence? Check my think/feel score) so many of my answers were choices rather than opinions, I used to be INTP though.

E(11%)N(66%)T(92%)P(50%)

Edited September 6, 2014 by TheGatesofLogic

Looks like I'm the first ENFP according to the table...

Extrovert: 22%, Intuitive: 12%, Feeling: 25%, Percieving: 11%

I updated the table again. Over 50 samples now!

Wow - thanks for the responses guys.
When I last took the test about 5 years ago I was INTJ today I got ISTJ ~ I guess retirement has changed me a tad.

Well then...I got ENTJ

Extravert(11%) iNtuitive(50%) Thinking(38%) Judging(1%)

Which is weird because I strive to be a Perceiving type of person.

INTP here

Introvert(89%) iNtuitive(31%) Thinking(25%) Perceiving(22%)

Well then...I got ENTJ

Extravert(11%) iNtuitive(50%) Thinking(38%) Judging(1%)

Which is weird because I strive to be a Perceiving type of person.

Judging for you is only 1% in favor over Perceiving which means that you are very balanced between this two. I also think that someone having all the aspects balanced would be a very balanced character capable of adapting to and handling all imaginable situations life will throw at someone.

Edited September 9, 2014 by gpisic
spelling error

I'm INTJ, and to be honest, I'm not shocked we hold a plurality. I guess that kind of intelligent thinker is the person who would play KSP in the first place.

Introvert(44%) iNtuitive(38%) Thinking(88%) Judging(1%)

INTP

Introvert(78%) iNtuitive(25%) Thinking(38%) Perceiving(22%)

I'm INTJ, and to be honest, I'm not shocked we hold a plurality.

Agree - but I am still surprised how skewed it is. I was expecting a few more extroverts at least.

Oh, and I have updated the table again.

Agree - but I am still surprised how skewed it is. I was expecting a few more extroverts at least.

You would expect that given extroverts are 65% of the goddamn population...I'm curious now. Hang on, I'm going to do some statistics.

EDIT: I'm doing some maths with the statistics from this thread. It would be awesome if I also had stats by gender as well, but oh well.

Edited September 12, 2014 by Samniss Arandeen
Stats work~
Hard core ISTJ. Last time I took the test it was 7/3 I, 18/2 S, 19/1 T and 20/0 J.

Heh.

INTJ

Introvert(100%) iNtuitive(25%) Thinking(100%) Judging(11%)

You have strong preference of Introversion over Extraversion (100%)

You have moderate preference of Intuition over Sensing (25%)

You have strong preference of Thinking over Feeling (100%)

You have slight preference of Judging over Perceiving (11%)

Left handed INTJ. Just the type who would get into KSP.

Best,

-Slashy
